name: Namur
fun_fact: Fun fact: Namur's Citadel is one of the largest fortifications in Europe - it's been fought over so many times (by Romans, Spanish, French, Dutch, and Germans) that it's called 'the Terrace of Europe', offering views of the confluence of the Sambre and Meuse rivers!
